law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 252, Pt. XXXI, sec. 1, effective April 25, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 3, effective July 1, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
